entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
